name: Jumpmaina
description:
Jumpmaina is a survival 2D gameplay in which you are the to survive by any means while dodging falling objects from the sky coming down at you. the game been in development for almost my sophomore and senior year at college and is one my most worked game I but out and I hope you enjoy the game and leave comments I would appreciate the feeback

Main Features
- Game where the longer you last the harder it will get for the player
-Very challenging at throughout time goes by
-A Timer system to tell you how long you been surviving 
-

Credits
-To all the testers that came and played my game before it was done, I thank you all my classmates at Cat360, my friends that tested it out, even my family that for being beta tester
-Thanks to the teachers I had in Bloomfield for helping me with this game, GJ from game design class from sophomore, professor blake and Brian from Cat 360 for their help with bugs and adding other feature
